statements: SELECT * FROM customer_experience;
SELECT customer_name, sales_team_contact FROM customer_experience;
SELECT customer_id, marketing_team_contact FROM customer_experience;
SELECT customer_name, customer_support_contact FROM customer_experience;
SELECT * FROM customer_experience ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, sales_team_contact, marketing_team_contact FROM customer_experience;
SELECT * FROM customer_experience WHERE customer_id = '37eb0bd6-7263-4c27-ae4c-4348a7e094d3';
SELECT customer_name, customer_support_contact FROM customer_experience WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name, marketing_team_contact, customer_support_contact FROM customer_experience WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY customer_support_contact DESC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, sales_team_contact, marketing_team_contact, customer_support_contact FROM customer_experience WHERE customer_id IN ('37eb0bd6-7263-4c27-ae4c-4348a7e094d3', '0256c5d6-8101-45f6-8289-8928133b86e4');
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM sales_team WHERE sales_id = 1;
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM sales_team ORDER BY sales_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_team;
SELECT support_name FROM customer_support_team WHERE support_id = 2;
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM sales_team WHERE sales_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_support_team WHERE support_name = 'Alice';
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM sales_team WHERE sales_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY sales_id DESC;
SELECT support_name, support_email FROM customer_support_team WHERE support_id < 5;
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM sales_team WHERE sales_email LIKE '%example.com%' ORDER BY sales_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM marketing_team;
SELECT id, role FROM customer_support_team WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, role FROM sales_team WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM marketing_team WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_team WHERE role = 'Manager' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM marketing_team WHERE id > 10 AND role = 'Specialist';
SELECT name, phone_number FROM customer_support_team WHERE role = 'Supervisor' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM sales_team WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR role = 'Director';
SELECT * FROM marketing_team WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND role = 'Consultant';
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT name, email FROM marketing_team WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT id, name, department FROM customer_support_team ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, touchpoint_type, touchpoint_date FROM customer_touchpoints WHERE customer_id = 123456;
SELECT id, name, email, department FROM customer_support_team WHERE department = 'Technical Support';
SELECT * FROM sales_team;
SELECT name, email FROM marketing_team WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT id, name, department FROM customer_support_team WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_touchpoints WHERE touchpoint_type IN ('Call', 'Email') ORDER BY touchpoint_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, touchpoint_type, SUBSTRING(interaction_details, 1, 50) AS short_details FROM customer_touchpoints WHERE touchpoint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SalesTeam;
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM SalesTeam WHERE sales_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CustomerTouchpoints ORDER BY touchpoint_date DESC;
SELECT touchpoint_type, COUNT(*) AS touchpoint_count FROM CustomerTouchpoints GROUP BY touchpoint_type;

SELECT sales_name, marketing_name, support_name FROM Collaborations INNER JOIN SalesTeam ON Collaborations.sales_id = SalesTeam.sales_id INNER JOIN MarketingTeam ON Collaborations.marketing_id = MarketingTeam.marketing_id INNER JOIN CustomerSupportTeam ON Collaborations.support_id = CustomerSupportTeam.support_id;
SELECT * FROM SalesTeam WHERE sales_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT sales_name, sales_email FROM SalesTeam WHERE sales_id = 1;
SELECT marketing_name FROM MarketingTeam ORDER BY marketing_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerTouchpoints WHERE touchpoint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_collaborations FROM Collaborations;
